1.さかなのロック機能の 説明です！|<br>|さかなぶくろの コマンドウィンドウの:
This is an explanation of the fish lock|function! When you select "Lock" in the|command window of the fish bag, the fish will|
|be locked. Locked fish cannot be released,|given to fish exchangers or old fishermen, or|put into the garden fish pond.|
|Locked fish can be unlocked by selecting|"Lock" again.|

2.<%sM_item>は|ロックされているため 逃がせません。|<end>: <%sM_item>|is locked and can't be let go.|<end>

3.この さかなは ピタリ賞のさかなです。|本当に逃がしますか？|<yesno_2>: This fish is a Perfect Size winner.|Are you sure you want to let him go?|<yesno_2><close>
